payload.message: Compile and send newsletter digest. Read ~/clawd/content-intelligence/config/sources.json, check for new articles in ~/clawd/content-intelligence/sources/*/insights/*.json, extract 2-5 key insights per high/medium priority source, and send formatted digest to Simon via Telegram. Include sections: AI/Tech, Self-Improvement, Business, Quick Links. Use action tags [Read] [Action] [Tool].
